parameters.name: EventBusName
parameters.description: The name of the event bus.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to be returned in a single call. You can use this parameter and the NextToken parameter to implement paging. A maximum of 100 entries can be returned in a single call.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: If you set the Limit parameter and excess return values exist, this parameter is returned.

parameters.name: RuleNamePrefix
parameters.description: The prefix of the rule name.
